During recent years, the 360Player team has been working hard to deliver an all-in-one experience to clubs and sports organizations, filling any need inside the club to manage operations. With the launch of the Training Planner feature, the All-In-One platform of 360Player is officially launched.

The 360Player platform has for many years helped teams and clubs with player development and communication, thanks to great features like Video analytics, Team wall, Statistics and Individual training programs to only mention a few. With the launch of the Training Planner feature, where coaches and coordinators can create exercises, sessions and share all of this in structured libraries, the 1.0 launch of 360Player All-In-One is here. 

Are you interested in 360Player for your organization. Contact hello@360player.com
